page.title: 01Uyeasound Westside.
page.content: The main feature of Uyeasound's Westside must be its piers.At Belmont is the roll-on,roll-off ferry terminal for the North Isles Ferry and where fishing boats take shelter in bad weather.In front of the Westside shop is the pier for pleasure boats of all types. Sheep,ponies and cattle roam the open heath and grassland and the Snowy Owl is frequently sighted.There is much coastline with otters and seabirds. The Westside has 4 large lochs and there is a Triangulation Station on Gallow Hill at a height of 99 feet above sea-level.Gallow Hill is the ancient execution site being the highest point in South Unst. The school,both shops and the Post Office are all in the Westside of Uyeasound.There is also housing.
